oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Thomas Larkin Harris
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of Thomas Larkin Harris, CSA, seated in uniform, holding a shotgun. Harris is holding his hat and has a pistol tucked into his belt. Harris, born in 1829 in Carroll County, served in Co. F, 12th Con. Tenn. Inf., CSA. He was killed at the Battle of Shiloh, April 1862.
